events.name: The Great Sphinx
events.description: A giant statue with a lion's body and a human head.

events.name: From Ears to Rears, a Group of Chimpanzees is Putting Grass in Strange Places, and Scientists Are Fascinated
events.description: In Zambia, a peculiar trend has swept through a group of chimpanzees: blades of grass, stylishly dangling from ears and their behinds.

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Giza, Egypt - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the ancient wonders of Giza, including the Pyramids of Giza and The Great Sphinx. Discover the secrets behind these mysterious structures and uncover the history that surrounds them.
